thread.title: Twitter Reacts To Appeals Court's Hold On Donald Trump's Muslim Ban!
thread.title_full: Twitter Reacts To Appeals Court's Hold On Donald Trump's Muslim Ban! | PerezHilton.com

author: perezhilton
title: Twitter Reacts To Appeals Court's Hold On Donald Trump's Muslim Ban!

organizations.name: scotland hated donald trump first & best

text:
Sorry Donald Trump ! You have been DENIED!
As we reported , on Thursday, the 9th Circuit Court of Appeals voted unanimously to DENY the reinstatement of the President's Muslim ban.
Related: Scotland Hated Donald Trump First & Best!!! 
The ruling was a big moment for immigrants and refugees who make up the unique and diverse fabric of America's population.
Not surprisingly, people went on Twitter and voiced their approval of the decision!
To see the best tweets, ch-ch-check them out (below)! 
The White House just taking L's left & right. Can't wait for the day when America says, "Donald Trump‚Ä¶.YOU'RE FIRED."
‚Äî Mr. Weeks (@MrDane1982) February 9, 2017 

The 9th Circuit Court of Appeals told Donald Trump to shove his #MuslimBan where the sun don't shine pic.twitter.com/YT9zkGBGuQ 
‚Äî LordXmen2k (@lordxmen2k) February 9, 2017 

The BAN didn't happen thanks to the noise you made. WALL won't happen either. Keep fighting. DONALD TRUMP loses! #NoBanNoWall 
‚Äî Tommy Campbell (@MrTommyCampbell) February 9, 2017 

NO TRAVEL BAN ‚Ä¶at least for now‚Ä¶way to go State of Washington üëçüá∫üá∏

@billmaher I bet Orange is the New Red right about now! #travelban #trump #appealscourt 
‚Äî Shelley Johns (@wifeofrus) February 9, 2017 

I hope the refusal to reinstate the travel ban is literally making @POTUS so angry all his blood vessels pop #resist #resist #resist

@realDonaldTrump you need 2 move forward & bring the nation together. Perhaps u shld be the 1 with the travel ban you r the danger :(

Who is the LOSER now, Mr. President? #9thcircut #travelban @SenJohnMcCain https://t.co/Bo2o8xPzXh

The #appealscourt to trump: pic.twitter.com/EtVRcln8d6

Donny not only were you just wrong in general but maybe you shouldn't have been talking shit about judges before the ruling! #appealscourt 
‚Äî Melissa Spivey (@Melissa_Spivey) February 9, 2017 

Little Donald doesn't want to give up his Muslim Ban
